interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Electric Shaver for Men, SOOCAS Mens Electric Razor, Wet & Dry IPX7 Waterproof Rotary Facial Shaver, Portable Face Shaver Cordless Travel USB Rechargeable for Husband Dad, Black Review Date: 2020/09/22 Store: SOOCAS Average Rating: 2.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'SOOCAS', 'Special Feature': 'Portable,Rechargeable,Cordless,Waterproof,Compact', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Included Components': 'Charger', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Package Dimensions': '7.36 x 4.21 x 2.68 inches; 11.18 Ounces', 'Batteries': '1 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included)', 'Manufacturer': 'SOOCAS'} Review Text: i'm surprise about the quality of this shaver, for most part it cuts really well and smooth.
the design is compact and not that heavy on hand, the battery last quite long, and i like the USB-C charging so i can use 1 charging for all. the battery last long enough.
over all this shaver is affordable and great purchase Review Title: Good inexpensive shaver Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Preference for Quality and Performance:** The user values products that deliver high-quality performance and efficiency, as indicated by their positive experience with the shaver's cutting ability and battery longevity.

- **Compact and Portable Design:** A preference for products that are lightweight and easy to carry is evident, suggesting a lifestyle that appreciates convenience, especially for travel or on-the-go use.

- **Rechargeable and Versatile Charging Options:** The user appreciates rechargeable items and specifically values USB-C charging capabilities, indicating a trend towards modern, multifunctional convenience.

- **Affordability:** The user favors inexpensive yet effective products, as highlighted by their focus on the shaver being an “affordable and great purchase."

- **Waterproof Features:** Interest in waterproof functionalities suggests a preference for durability and practicality in grooming tools.

Overall, this user shows an inclination towards smart, functional purchases that combine value, performance, and convenience, particularly in grooming products.
